title: Learner-Driven Social Inquiry Project: Spatial Concept-Based Learning Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social science concepts (e.g., sociology, economics)
context.additional_context: Strengthening field investigations and case analysis through smartphone-based collaborative tools

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three learning pathways for solving social issues using a spatial concept model (location, niche, direction, etc.)
Learners can adjust the step gradient from their initial learning position to the target position by incorporating peer feedback
Learners can perform community problem-solving projects at least twice using smartphones and improve through formative assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
